dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5008 IH: To prohibit United States voluntary contributions to the United Nations Democracy Fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit United States voluntary contributions to the United Nations Democracy Fund.

section.header: Prohibition on United States voluntary contributions to the United Nations Democracy Fund

subsection.text: No funds made available to any Federal department or agency may be used to make United States voluntary contributions to the United Nations Democracy Fund (UNDEF).
Subsection (a) applies with respect to funds made available for fiscal year 2015 and subsequent fiscal years.
